_header: How slyly the death shall robben them
_description: Death and the man without ‘counsel’, in a Latin sermon, in die natali domini — four monorhyming lines

CULIi38.Transcription:
how slely þe deth schal robben hamhow apertely he schal ateyne
                    hamhow diuersly he schal towche hemhow vileynliche deth scorneth
                    hem
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 15.
